I am using 1.2.0M2 on Eclipse 3.1M4 (also tried 3.1M3 - same error there).

Hi Eric, from the stack trace it looks like you've picked up the Eclipse 3.0
build of AJDT. Please double-check that you've got the 3.1 version. You can
check this by going into the org.eclipse.aspectj* feature and seeing if the
update site url in the feature.xml file contains "31" or "30".
If you're using Eclipse 3.1, then it has to be M3. Any other version, including
M4, will definitely not work.

Thanks Matt. Indeed that seems to have been the problem. I re-downloaded the
feature and now it works. Strange though, since the update site seemed to be ok.
Do you know where it is stored (per workplace or per eclipse installation)?

Cheers,
Eric

I think it's stored in the configuration directory, per installation.
BTW, I've raised bug 81611 to cover the issues with Eclipse 3.1M4.
